Technical Analysis of Online Meeting Tool with Automatic Language Recognition、
text:
In the era of globalization, attending international conferences and business negotiations has become a requirement for an increasing number of people. However, language barriers often prevent many from participating in such events. To address this issue, our team has developed an online meeting tool that automatically recognizes the language of attendees, providing high-quality simultaneous interpretation services. Our online meeting tool is built on advanced speech recognition technology. When attendees join a meeting, our tool automatically recognizes their speech and compares the results with a pre-set language library to determine their language. Next, the tool converts the attendees' speech into the corresponding language text and performs real-time translation. Finally, the translated results are presented to other attendees through simultaneous interpretation, thus achieving the functions of automatic language recognition and simultaneous translation.

To ensure translation quality, our online meeting tool employs multiple speech recognition and translation technologies. First, we use deep learning algorithms to recognize the speech of attendees and natural language processing to perform translation. In addition, we combine various technologies such as machine translation and manual proofreading to continually optimize translation quality, ensuring the accuracy and fluency of simultaneous interpretation.

Furthermore, our online meeting tool has high adaptability and scalability. It can adapt to different network environments and speech characteristics, accommodate multiple attendees simultaneously, and support multiple languages, including Chinese, English, Japanese, and Korean.

In summary, our online meeting tool achieves the functions of automatic language recognition and simultaneous interpretation, enabling easy participation in global conferences and business negotiations. It is built on advanced speech recognition and translation technology, with high adaptability and scalability. If you are interested in our online meeting tool and would like to learn more about its technical details or discuss related technical issues with us, please leave a message below or contact us. We look forward to exchanging ideas and cooperating with you.

Then my team has developed it and it's free to try Follow felomeet.com on Twitter @wngyunb2

Show HN: Make your non-native English native
text:
Growing up in an immigrant family, I've been asked to help family members correct their English many times.

When the ChatGPT API came out last week, I realized that it's now possible to get very reasonable results turning non-native English into native English automatically, including being able to adjust the level of formality.

I put up a demo at https://www.betterenglishai.com/ – any feedback, especially from non-native English speakers, would be very welcome.
